titleStmt.title: Some reflections upon the pretended parallel in the play called, The Duke of Guise : in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.

notesStmt.note: An attack upon The Duke of Guise, a play by Dryden and Nathaniel Lee.
Ascribed to Thomas Shadwell. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
